SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers

Class MyCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers.MyCard
public class MyCard extends Object
Represents a card with an id, flip state, and associated images for front and back. It provides functionality to flip the card and manage its interactive state in the GUI.

  • Constructor Details

    • MyCard

      public MyCard(int id, boolean isFlipped, OverviewController controller)
      Constructs a new MyCard with specified id, flip state, and controller.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the card
      isFlipped - the initial flip state of the card (true if flipped, false otherwise)
      controller - the controller managing the card's interactions

    • MyCard

      public MyCard(int id, OverviewController controller)
      Constructs a new MyCard with specified id and controller. The card is initially not flipped.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the card
      controller - the controller managing the card's interactions

  • Method Details

    • createInteractiveHandCard

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createInteractiveHandCard(boolean flipped)
      Creates an interactive card image view.
      Parameters:
      flipped - true if the card is flipped (back image), false otherwise (front image)
      Returns:
      the created interactive ImageView

    • getImageView

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getImageView()
      Returns:
      the ImageView of the card (front or back image)

    • isFlipped

      public boolean isFlipped()
      Returns:
      true if the card is flipped, false otherwise

    • flip

      public void flip()
      Flips the card, changing its current state to the opposite side.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns:
      the id of the card
